headline: EPA proposes giving Texas authority to oversee CO2 injection permits
summary: The U.S. EnvironmentalProtection Agency on Monday proposed approving Texas'application to oversee its own permitting for projects to injectcarbon dioxide underground, a move long sought by that...

headline: Can OXY Stock Continue to Benefit From its Permian Basin Focus?
summary: OXY trims Permian spending by $100 million. Drilling efficiency and usage of new technology will reduce operating expenses, without sacrificing the volumes.
